title: Matchmaking error during promos?
body:
So I've been to promos 5 times now, and I've noticed in the matches leading up to them, I play with players much higher than me silver 5/2/3 , sometimes double silvers. But when I finally reach promos, my entire team is filled with players from bronze 4/5 exclusively. Whats up with that bs?

Not to mention i'd be on a winning streak .
Are you messing with me riot?

replies.body: It's because you were on a winning streak. Win streaks means your mmr will be rising, which means you'll be versing better and better people until you start losing again and it drops/evens out.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=keBaPjPX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-10T15:27:15.281+0000)
>
> It's because you were on a winning streak. Win streaks means your mmr will be rising, which means you'll be versing better and better people until you start losing again and it drops/evens out.

thanks bro, i'll make sure to lose a a game before promos. :P
nah but thanks for letting me know
